pages.text: $(o)"There is Contentment to be Found in Contemplating Nature, and Endurance born of the memory of Contentment"$()

Centered on the $(l:astral:garden#cushion)Comfortable Cushion$(/l), the Garden counts the amount of natural passive life and water around you and generates a level of Contentment based on it. Collect Astral plants of various sorts to maximize it's efficiency.
Benefits: When naturally healing you last longer the greater your contentment level. It may also prove to lend power to your inner energies, and assist with botanical magics.
